CreatorFactory

nodes.documentation:
@dev The contructor to create this contract.
Allowing only the app-owner to call this contract

nodes.name: createBountyCreator
getDeployedCreators

devdoc.author: Smit Rajput
devdoc.details: Works like a factory to create contracts for bounty-creators

constructor.details: The contructor to create this contract. Allowing only the app-owner to call this contract

createBountyCreator(string).details: Used to create conracts for bounty-creators i.e contracts representing them

params.name: The name of the bounty-creator Only allowed to be called in case of no emergency

getDeployedCreators().details: To receive the addresses of deployed contracts representing bounty-creators
getDeployedCreators().return: deployedCreators An array of type 'BountyCreator' representing addresses of  bounty-creators

toggleEmergency().details: To change the state of emergency from true to false and vice-versa  Only the owner has the permission to call this function

devdoc.title: CreatorFactory
